response.overview: Over the course of a single night, Boney (a skeleton pizza delivery driver) navigates a city that grows stranger with every stop. Animated in one continuous, unbroken take, the film follows Boneyâ€™s surreal journey through the big city, where every stop is weirder than the last, and the tips rarely justify the trauma.

response.title: Big City Pizza
